a2f8041a-6e0b-493b-9d5b-1c80220b1e4e.name: Combat Reflexes
a2f8041a-6e0b-493b-9d5b-1c80220b1e4e.notes: Never freeze; +6 on all IQ rolls to wake up or to recover from surprise or mental stun; Your side gets +1 to initiative rolls (+2 if you're the leader)

125e8f6a-044a-4b80-b8ee-d7805e06425e.name: Off-Hand Weapon Training (@Weapon@)
125e8f6a-044a-4b80-b8ee-d7805e06425e.notes: Replaces equal-named technique on p. B232

5af14b30-9777-42a1-95a9-02a9b5f4d471.name: Weapon Bond
5af14b30-9777-42a1-95a9-02a9b5f4d471.notes: You own a Weapon that is uniquely suited to you.

3208eeef-bfa1-4192-9bed-48388a84f520.name: Gunslinger
3208eeef-bfa1-4192-9bed-48388a84f520.notes: No Bulk penalties; half Fast-Draw (Ammo) penalties; ignore Spraying Fire (p. B409)

fc7b2164-c6c1-489c-9045-18047be5707d.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

3d767f9a-36a6-42fa-aaf2-fbcf02d3446f.name: Can obtain information using supernatural talents

6afbcac5-f9ca-410e-813d-280c5785a4e3.name: Legal Enforcement Powers (@Federal or Secret Service@)

d810e46b-ecee-40bc-aa55-b15525b5eeeb.name: Luck, Extraordinary
d810e46b-ecee-40bc-aa55-b15525b5eeeb.notes: Usable once per 30 minutes of play

e052cf9d-777e-4947-b7c7-82e67c7f709b.name: Easy to Hit
e052cf9d-777e-4947-b7c7-82e67c7f709b.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

624983a7-950e-4b79-b52d-1e954cb26868.name: Luck
624983a7-950e-4b79-b52d-1e954cb26868.notes: Usable once per hour of play

84307021-0370-403d-8f16-556606a8ee19.name: Insomniac (Mild)
84307021-0370-403d-8f16-556606a8ee19.notes: GM secretly rolls 3d for the number of days between episodes

e0166df1-cd6d-48af-92ec-27eeaf4e9abc.name: Insomniac (Severe)
e0166df1-cd6d-48af-92ec-27eeaf4e9abc.notes: GM secretly rolls 2d-1 for the number of days between episodes

c8a53571-5dd8-40ba-8c2f-803b8d54744d.name: Intolerance (@Rival nation or other large group@)

f265690a-37aa-4083-9b67-7c90826de464.name: Choose five
f265690a-37aa-4083-9b67-7c90826de464.notes: Or four, and put two points in another. You can also spend those two points on unarmed combat skills.

1e1c6c85-f326-4a70-b0d6-88878d1a048c.name: Choose four
1e1c6c85-f326-4a70-b0d6-88878d1a048c.notes: Or three, and raise one by a level.

28a45f9f-3ad3-4f9a-a058-196d68f93b24.name: Judo
28a45f9f-3ad3-4f9a-a058-196d68f93b24.notes: Allows parrying two different attacks per turn, one with each hand.

aa50fd59-c5a7-4eb5-997d-984db76c0523.name: Choose 18 points
aa50fd59-c5a7-4eb5-997d-984db76c0523.notes: Either two or six points may be used to level-up one of these skills.

2031da72-b170-4eac-87fe-0d879e93309a.name: Intelligence
2031da72-b170-4eac-87fe-0d879e93309a.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

9f456df4-768d-423d-bdd0-969598a73665.name: Choose 16 points
9f456df4-768d-423d-bdd0-969598a73665.notes: Either two or six of those points may be used to increase one of these skills by one or two levels.

641c736c-de1b-4ebc-ac1d-b57e36b10c70.name: Choose 18 points
641c736c-de1b-4ebc-ac1d-b57e36b10c70.notes: Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.

25ae8a9e-30db-4c38-b1e1-3920a5be63d8.name: Security
25ae8a9e-30db-4c38-b1e1-3920a5be63d8.notes: Choose 20 points. Either two or six of these points may be used to raise one of these skills by one or two levels.
